Pancakes - But Better

peak pancake performance

Everyone loves pancakes, yeah? But it's a gamble to try and find a recipe that doesn't end up with batter everywhere and sad, mushy cakes.


Well, I'm about to blow your mind here: there's different types of pancakes. You've got your fluffy, tall ones, and the ones that feel like a brick in your stomach. Maybe feeling like you just ate cement is your thing, I don't know. Moral of the story: one is significantly better than the other.

So why do some pancakes suck so much?

because ya messed up, dummy. ya done goofed. played yourself.

So what are you gonna do about it?

Let's start off with the ingredients


So most pancake recipes tend to be pretty much the same, right? WRONG. A lot of em lack the things that make your pancakes light and fluffy, so you end up with mush and just an overall unpleasant breakfast experience.

Out of all the pancake recipes that I've tried, this is hands down the best one. Trust me on this.
